name: places/ChIJYU2i8ftYwokRKS91K5bejv4
adrFormatAddress: 653 5th Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA

editorialSummary.text: Luxury brand founded in 1847 specializing in high jewelry, jewelry, timepieces & accessories.

originalText.text:
Poor quality of service and atmosphere for a luxury flagship. It's hard to find help, and when you can, it's absent-minded and impersonal. They act like they're doing you a favor by interacting with you at all. I waited 45 minutes for the service bar (you are dissuaded from browsing the store during that time), and the experience is not unlike a doctor's waiting room. In the end there were almost no options for leather watch straps, and not a single deployment buckle in stock. I would need to preorder with a lead time of 4 months, and pay up front (final sale, no less) as well. For a leather strap and buckle! It makes no sense. The woman who helped me couldn't be bothered to give me the information I needed, instead suggesting that I take photos on my own. I'd rather visit any Cartier boutique overseas than come back here.

Edit: I recently visited multiple Cartier boutiques in Asia and the sales folks at each location all immediately told me that the watch I was looking to swap to a leather band for was not capable of it. I don't know why the employees at the NYC flagship don't know something so fundamental and almost sold me something FINAL SALE that I wouldn't even be able to use. Insanely bad experience. Don't buy from here—they don't deserve your patronage.

originalText.text: Large selection of jewelry, the only thing I didn’t like was that after choosing a ring, the seller took it with him, this is not pleasant for the buyer. Nobody will steal it. Perhaps they replaced it for me. they should make the purchase in front of me, and not take the jewelry and return with it. There are doubts that the ring could have been changed. Doubts arose.

originalText.text: I have a pasha watch that I wear ALL THE TIME.  Whenever anything is wrong,  they fix it and it is clear they stand behind their product and fix things quickly.   Everyone in the store was helpful and pleasant.  Thank you for a great experience and fixing my favorite watch so quickly!!

text.text: I have a pasha watch that I wear ALL THE TIME.  Whenever anything is wrong,  they fix it and it is clear they stand behind their product and fix things quickly.   Everyone in the store was helpful and pleasant.  Thank you for a great experience and fixing my favorite watch so quickly!!

originalText.text:
We scheduled an engagement ring appointment, and it lasted 10 minutes from start to finish.  No introduction from the staff, no seats offered, staff hurriedly placed a few rings on the counter, and then asked if there was anything else.

Disappointed with the level of service for a flagship, especially when Tiffany’s offered a full hour appointment to really understand their clients.

I suppose if fast food service speed is what you want, come here

originalText.text: Our absolute fav boutique in the city. We love visiting Cartier Mansion whenever we have a reason to celebrate. Cartier Mansion is one of the most iconic boutiques on the Fifth Avenue. You will not miss it
